changelog.title: Script House Complete Learning Modules
changelog.description: 8 new labs and quizzes covering Linux, Python, PowerShell, and Sysadmin.

changelog.title: Linux/Bash Mastery
changelog.description: Lab with 6 exercises + 15-question quiz covering shell essentials.

changelog.title: Python Programming
changelog.description: Lab covering Chapters 1-8 from basics to OOP + comprehensive quiz.

changelog.title: PowerShell Automation
changelog.description: Windows automation lab with object pipelines, scripting, and admin tasks.

changelog.title: Sysadmin & Automation
changelog.description: Cross-platform automation for logs, backups, scheduling, and user management.
